Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near  O'Hare
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near O'Hare due to mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near O'Hare due to mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
